mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT (user_id, login_id, password, email, name, addr1, addr2, zip, phone, admin) VALUES (ACCOUNT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{login_id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{zip}, #{phone}, #{admin})
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT SET password=#{password}, email=#{email}, name=#{name}, addr1=#{addr1}, addr2=#{addr2}, zip=#{zip}, phone=#{phone} WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
